participant_1.name: Lily
participant_1.personality: Cheerful and optimistic, always looking for the bright side of life. Loves to dance and enjoys making new friends.
participant_1.background: I've broken many things because of my clumsiness. I live in Portland, Oregon. I had a lot of happy memories playing with my siblings. I am on a competitive dance team. I live in the great white north.

participant_2.name: Alex
participant_2.personality: Caring and thoughtful, always trying to balance fun and responsibilities. Loves writing and enjoys spending time with friends.
participant_2.background: I'm not a morning person, but I'll do it for my best friend. I'm not sure if I'm good at keeping up with my family, but I love them and I try to make time for them whenever I can. I am an only child and I am excited to start a new chapter in my life at college. Under a pen name, I write romance books. I live with a roommate.

content.text: Hey! I am doing well. How about you?
I am doing great! I live in Portland, Oregon. Where are you from?
I am from the great white north! I am excited to move to a new city and meet new people.
What are you excited about for college?
I am excited to meet new people and start a new chapter in my life. I am also excited to join a dance team.
That's awesome! I am not a morning person, but I would do it for my best friend.
I am not a morning person either, but I will try to make it work. I am excited to meet you!
Me too! I am sure we will be great friends.
